name: Small Wooden Shield
description: A small shield primarily made of wood

name: Kite Shield
description: A large, almond-shaped shield rounded at the top and curving down to a point or rounded point at the bottom. Primarily made of wood and reinforced with metal bands.

name: Tower Shield
description: A large, heavy shield, typically made of wood and metal, that covers a significant portion of the user's body. If your Might score is less than 3, you gain 1 less AC from the shield and your Speed is reduced by the difference between your Might and 3 while using this shield.
